reviews.review: This Is my favourite film of 2017 by the end me and my family were on the edge of our seats the kids enjoyed the emoji-tastic humor and they're begging to see it again

This movie is one that shouldn't exist, even for kids. The storyline isn't horrible, it was the execution that was miserable. There are also a few moments in the movie that made me question whether or not this truly should be a 'kids' movie. It's not too hard to make a movie that appeals to both kids and adults the same, but The Emoji Movie shows us how to try to appeal to both, fall flat on their face, and make it look easy. There was also some major sloppiness animation-wise at the end of the movie, there was one scene at the end where they just stopped making the character talk he was just talking and no mouth movement. Made me scoff and shake my head at how lazy some people can get in show business. In conclusion: Emoji Movie is a cheesy, horrible, cringe-fest that was an absolute major dud and I feel bad for anybody who paid to see this atrocity. 

Movie about emojis

In reality this might strike a kids eye as emojis are the hottest thing on the internet In reality this movie was one big cash grab I went to watch it with my cousin and we both HATED it the movie was so bland like nothing was put to thought into this movie and was horrible gene did not have much character or hi-5 jailbreak was okay but was not able to make this movie redeemable in reality if you want to see a better movie watch stuff like home alone 2 or wreck it ralph those were good and fine movies this movie is just another sony tryhard and can never redeem sony as a movie company
This movie cured my cancer, by giving me mega-cancer

The Emoji Movie was a perfect movie, comedic, deep, saddening, and so beautiful. The casting with Sir Patrick Stewart, T.J. Miller, and James Corden was quite possibly the best idea for casting Hollywood has seen in decades. When the love arc of Gene and Jailbreak ended I cried in my seat, their love was so genuine and GODDAMIT WHY AM I GIVING THIS THING A REVIEW I WASTED LIKE $12 ON THIS SHITTY MOVIE AS A JOKE.

The only good thing about the Cash grab on millennial movie is the animation is not that bad but that does not excuse it from the terrible plot characters morals and it is one of the first movies where i could tell everything that was going to happen overall the emoji movie is should just be called the cliche movie
What that actual hell did I just watch????

literally the greatest movie of all time, the soundtrack was amazing, all of the characters were amazingly written, you will cry for every you see even the little flexing arm in the corner of one scene, i cried even for him. Go see this movie, its better than: baby driver, Dunkirk and war for the planet of the apes. if this doesn't win ALL of the Oscars for 10 YEARS, this movie has not been done justice
It's so bad I lost 5000 brain cells, but the worst thing is, your kids will like it
